languages.text: Кто-то следит за линией связи, кто-то строчит письменные приказы. Отряд Мастера вокса настраивает внутреннюю связь по комм-бусинам. Команда действует быстро и слаженно, и уже через несколько минут сервочерепа с указаниями от Лорд-капитана ныряют в шахту вентиляции и теряются во мгле.

traits.locale_text: Кто-то следит за линией связи, кто-то строчит письменные приказы. Отряд Мастера Вокса настраивает внутренюю связь по комм-бусинам. Команда действует быстро и слаженно, и уже через несколько минут сервочерепа с указаниями от Лорд-капитана ныряют в шахту вентиляции и теряются во мгле.

languages.text: One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.
languages.original_text: Кто-то следит за линией связи, кто-то строчит письменные приказы. Отряд Мастера вокса настраивает внутреннюю связь по комм-бусинам. Команда действует быстро и слаженно, и уже через несколько минут сервочерепа с указаниями от Лорд-капитана ныряют в шахту вентиляции и теряются во мгле.

traits.locale_text: One is watching the comm line, another is preparing written orders. The Vox Master's unit is setting up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and only after a few moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

One is watching the comm line, another is preparing written orders. The Vox Master's unit is setting up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and only after a few moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

languages.text: Uno vigila la línea de comunicación y otro prepara órdenes escritas. La unidad de la maestra de vocos prepara un sistema de comunicación interno con cuentas de comunicación. Los esfuerzos de la tripulación son coordinados y eficaces y, en cuestión de momentos, numerosos servocráneos llevan órdenes escritas de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} por el conducto de ventilación.
languages.original_text: One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

traits.locale_text: Uno vigila la línea de comunicación y otro prepara órdenes escritas. La unidad de la maestra de vocos prepara un sistema de comunicación interno con cuentas de comunicación. Los esfuerzos de la tripulación son coordinados y eficaces y, en cuestión de momentos, numerosos servocráneos llevan órdenes escritas de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} por el conducto de ventilación.

languages.text: 一个人负责监视通讯线路，另一个人负责准备书面命令。音阵大师的助手们通过通讯珠建立了内部通讯系统。船员们协调得很出色，权宜之计也产生了成效。没过多久，携带领主舰长命令的伺服头骨就划入了通风井，消失在了一片黑暗之中。
languages.original_text: One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

traits.locale_text: 一个人负责监视通讯线路，另一个人负责准备书面命令。音阵大师的助手们通过通讯珠建立了内部通讯系统。船员们协调得很出色，权宜之计也产生了成效。没过多久，携带领主舰长命令的伺服头骨就划入了通风井，消失在了一片黑暗之中。

languages.text: ひとりは通信ラインを監視して、もうひとりは書面の命令を実行する準備している。ヴォクス・マスターの部隊は、通信機を通して内部通信システムを設定した。クルーの作業はきちんと整っていて、すぐにロード・キャプテンからの指示を伝えるサーヴォスカルが換気シャフトに飛び込み、暗闇の中に消えていった。
languages.original_text: One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

traits.locale_text: ひとりは通信ラインを監視して、もうひとりは書面の命令を実行する準備している。ヴォクス・マスターの部隊は、通信機を通して内部通信システムを設定した。クルーの作業はきちんと整っていて、すぐにロード・キャプテンからの指示を伝えるサーヴォスカルが換気シャフトに飛び込み、暗闇の中に消えていった。

languages.text: Einer von ihnen überwacht die Kommunikation, ein anderer bereitet schriftliche Befehle vor. Die Einheit der Vox-Meisterin richtet ein internes Kommunikationssystem über Voxstecker ein. Die Bemühungen der Crew sind zielführend und koordiniert. Wenige Augenblicke später verschwinden Servoschädel mit Anweisungen des Lord Captains in der Dunkelheit des Lüftungsschachtes.
languages.original_text: One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

traits.locale_text: Einer von ihnen überwacht die Kommunikation, ein anderer bereitet schriftliche Befehle vor. Die Einheit der Voxmeisterin richtet ein internes Kommunikationssystem über Voxstecker ein. Die Bemühungen der Crew sind zielführend und koordiniert. Wenige Augenblicke später verschwinden Servoschädel mit Anweisungen des Lord Captains in der Dunkelheit des Lüftungsschachtes.

languages.text: L'un d'eux surveille les communications, tandis qu'un autre prépare des ordres écrits. De son côté, l'unité de la maîtresse-vox met en place un système de transmission interne par le biais de communicateurs. Grâce aux efforts rapides et coordonnés de l'équipage, des servocrânes sont bientôt prêts à partir par les conduits d'aération pour transmettre les instructions {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} au reste du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.

traits.locale_text: L'un d'eux surveille les communications, tandis qu'un autre prépare des ordres écrits. De son côté, l'unité de la maîtresse-vox met en place un système de transmission interne par le biais de communicateurs. Grâce aux efforts rapides et coordonnés de l'équipage, des servocrânes sont bientôt prêts à partir par les conduits d'aération pour transmettre les instructions {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} au reste du vaisseau.

languages.text: Biri iletişim hattını izliyor, diğeri ise yazılı emirleri hazırlıyor. Voks Üstadı'nın birimi, mikro telsizler aracılığıyla bir dâhili iletişim sistemi kuruyor. Mürettebatın çabaları yerinde ve derli toplu. Öyle ki birkaç dakika sonrasında Lord Kaptan'ın talimatlarını taşıyan hizmeletler, havalandırma borularına dalıp kasvetin içinde kaybolmaya başlıyor.
languages.original_text: One monitors the comm line, another prepares written orders. The Vox Master's unit sets up an internal communications system via comm-beads. The crew's efforts are expedient and well-coordinated, and within moments, servo-skulls carrying instructions from the Lord Captain are diving into the ventilation shaft and vanishing into the gloom.
